Someone, hopefully you, wants to reset the password on 
your account at {{ config.base_domain }}.

If you want to reset your password, just click the link below.

{{ config.ssl_domain }}{% url baseacct-reset-key key %}

If you didn't request this, you don't need to do anything; you won't 
receive any more email from us, and your password will not be changed!


{{ config.base_domain }} Team
